title: Classic Movie Cars & Chases
description: Screeching tires, roaring engines, and unforgettable rides -- test your knowledge of classic movie car chases and iconic vehicles!

questions.question: Steve McQueen drove which iconic car in the famous chase scene through San Francisco in 'Bullitt' (1968)?
In 'The French Connection' (1971), Gene Hackman chases an elevated train through which New York City borough?
James Bond drove which car model in 'Goldfinger' (1964), complete with gadgets?
In 'The Italian Job' (1969), what type of small car is famously used for the getaway through the streets of Turin?
What kind of car was the time machine in 'Back to the Future' (1985)?
In 'Smokey and the Bandit' (1977), Burt Reynolds drives which black and gold car?
The 'General Lee,' a 1969 Dodge Charger, was the famous car from which TV show turned movie?
In 'Chitty Chitty Bang Bang' (1968), what special abilities does the car possess?
options: It can fly and float on water

questions.question: Which 1974 film features a chase involving a yellow 1973 Dodge Monaco police car, later inspiring 'The Blues Brothers'?
